### Libraries

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```


The data come from the [UCI Machine Learning Repository](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/index.php) and the direct link for the data and description is [here](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/wiki4he)

```{r}
path <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00334/wiki4HE.csv"

dta <- read_delim(path, delim = ";")


glimpse(dta)
```
